title: guerrilla
resume: Set against the backdrop of one of the most explosive times in U.K. history, Guerilla tells the story of a politically active couple whose relationship and values are tested when they liberate a political prisoner and form a radical underground cell in 1970s London. This six-part limited series is from Academy Award®-winner John Ridley, and stars Freida Pinto, Babou Ceesay and Idris Elba.
